position.marginalia_text: in northwales both his feet croked inward as [yf - deleted] they war broken, he being a dwarf, and creping on hand and foote, big hedded and chest[..] with a prety berd: semyng to be of [natu..] [.ost] sanguine and so[m]thing &Mercury;iall.
at Marlborow m[iste]r peche. on the morrow after hole rode daye, and that [th]ere holy rode day was on a thursday.
Anno 1548, vel 49 septembris 15 / mane hora 9 / circa Londiniu[m]. filia Comitis De P.
at Chelsey. Anno 1551 the monday after [....] [.....] his day in the nigtes at two of the clock [....] [...wolld] [swits..] [....] was maried bu 18 wekes. [...] [...]
26 octobris. [...] brachia ad [a....] vsq[ue] adha[e]rebant corpori et [...men] ea at[...] att... cu[m] [oculis] capiti adha[e]rebant,

Anno 15[48 - deleted]47 11 dece[m]bri[s] mane hor 2 vel circiter. Londini Ambuose. [...] et moriet[ur] 155[.] 11 [Auguste] nocte circa 9a[m]. In Van hay { Anno 1459 26 maij, no[cte] hor. 11 filius. [moriebatur] Junij 13 eode[m] anno. Willia[m]. Anno 1551 21 octobris [...] [...] [...te] inter [v..] et prima[m]. propè 12a[m]. Lo[n]d.. filius parvus. 1550. 12 Auguste hora 8 vel ante 8a[m] ante meridie[m] filia Thorasi moriebatur [...] [vixit] me[n]te. [Anno 1553 Martij 17 a meridie ho. 1. filia que huiustru[m] pedre[m] distortu[m] [navuit] / mortu.. Anno 1509 vel 1508.
On Crispinas day 21 october my mother was borne / so whome I am very like in [vis...] [sae...] my na.es.
oporte magis et breviores, inter ad [..da[m]que] vene morata, modesta [...] [...] [...] viro vita[m] molesta[m] habebat. filiu[m[ habebat [...] [...] [....] et

[soliu[m]] habebat [...] et [anni] post, ego co[..]ptus era et tres filios post me [...] plures q[uam] septe[m] habebat, sed [se....e] [...] fligatur [a..] care et vna[m] filia[m] habe[...] vltimo ex alis filijs [..] literis et tande[m] circa [annu[m]] 1549 partes in magna [calamitatis] [...] et dura[n]te spatio aliquo [....] [cictit...t], tame[n] ante illud [....] satis [prof...e] viverat [etc]. Mater de [...] [d...] [g...] [....] / et pater [e....] moriebatur circa [...] et [nat...] anno 1551 [...] [...] [ista] [...] in [...] [...] et [sed...] [...] [p.tudis] et [...] [...] / h[a]ec [...] [...] [...] [...] [...] [...] [...] patri suo [si...] eratq[ue]
[his] mother had the plage at her bijrth.

Anno 1552 5 Aprilis hora 11 m[inutae] 30 ante meridie[m]. [..stres] [...] [...] [...] {Anno 1540 octobris 27. mane hora 6 m[inutae] 20 polus 52. Anno 1544 Junij 8 mane hor. 2 m[inutae] 45} Asce[n]de[n]s &Scorpio; 3. } filiu[m] &Gemini; 11 filiu[m] &Scorpio; 3 filiu[m] Anno 1541 Septe[m]bris [...] 15 mane hora 9 Mater horu[m] triu[m] a[e]grotare ... in [fane] [Februari - deleted] Januarij et moriebatur 21 februarij Londini. Armes [...] in [...] /1531. 2 dece[m]bris hora 11 [...] nocte. Anno 1530 vel 29/ on holy rode day mane hora [..] [...] fro[m] carlyo[n] in Wales.
